# Red Sovereign

> AI Strategy & Transformation — helping businesses become AI-capable organizations.

Red Sovereign helps businesses train their teams, automate operations, build custom software, and establish permanent AI development capability — without hiring developers or becoming dependent on vendors.

## Services

- **Activate**: AI productivity training that makes your team 2–3× more productive
- **Automate**: Operations audit and AI agent development to scale without hiring
- **Build**: Custom software and AI products built with AI-powered development
- **Operate**: Governance, processes, and capability transfer for permanent self-sufficiency
